scripts.predeploy: git log -1 --pretty=format:'{ "date":"%cI", "commit":"%H" }' > git-commit.json && zip -r functions.zip . -i git-commit.json
scripts.copytoS3-lambda-functions: npm run predeploy && zip -r functions.zip . -i \*.js -i git-commit.json -i node_modules/\* -x test/\* -x node_modules/aws-sdk/\* -x node_modules/mocha/\* && echo Copying to S3... && aws s3 cp functions.zip s3://YOURBUCKETHERE/YOURPATHHERE/functions-doi-`git log -1 --pretty=format:'%H'`-`date -u "+%Y%m%dT%H%M%S"`.zip
